message: The room is small, with white curtains.

name: 看護士
message: "Sei, your brother is here."
The nurse goes to the window to open the curtains. I take a few deep breaths before approaching the bed.
A man is lying there, his head covered with bandages. Only his eyes and mouth are exposed. He appears to be sleeping.
Sei...?

name: 看護士
message: "He spent most of his time here in a coma, so it may be hard for him to talk. He has regained consciousness, though, and he can hear you."
No... This has to be someone else, right?
It's hard to look at the man. What has he been through?

name: 蒼葉
message: "How did he wind up here?"

name: 看護士
message: "He was transferred to us about three months ago. Before that, he was in a hospital overseas."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Overseas?"

name: 看護士
message: "Yes. I heard that his caretaker asked for the transfer."
His caretaker? Who could that be?

name: 看護士
message: "The doctors were surprised by how fast he recovered after the transfer. He regained consciousness last month."

name: 看護士
message: "You should talk to him. I'll remove his bandages now."
The nurse gently unwinds his bandages while I watch, my heart pounding.
First, black hair appears. It's shorter than I remember Sei's hair being. Maybe they cut it for him.
After that, his forehead... his nose and cheeks...
Soon, she reaches his neck.
It is Sei.
He looks so pale, like a porcelain doll...
Sei... What happened to you? Are you really okay?
I put my hands on the side of the bed and lean toward his face.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Sei. Can you hear me?"
My voice comes out hoarse. I gasp; Sei's eyelids just twitched.
And then, slowly...<k> they open.
At first, he only stares at the ceiling.
But when I touch his shoulder gently, his gaze shifts to my face.
His eyes...
They're... amber...
That gentle amber...
No... It can't be...
Sei slowly lifts his arm and touches my cheek. His lips move, but no words come.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...What?"
I move my face a little bit closer.
His fingers brush my cheek again. Is he telling me to get closer? I inch in a little more.
And then... he licks my cheek.
I look into his eyes. That familiar gesture...
My chest fills with warmth. Now I understand.
That game... The princess, happily carrying her present...
It all makes sense now.
I know who's lying there.
He smiles awkwardly. His lips move.
...Aoba.
He's only mouthing the sounds, but I hear his voice clearly.
That deep voice that always called my name.
It's him. He's come back to me.
I thought that I would never touch him again.
But Sei, my brother, left me one last present.
I put my hands on his cheeks and press my forehead to his.
And then, I whisper...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Welcome back."
